transcript.text: chapter 5 walking in the spirit if there
is one thing that stands is the most
important lesson to learn for the dark
days of tribulation ahead it must be
learning how to walk in the spirit how
to listen to his voice how many times do
we read of the Messiah closeted himself
away in the desert or taking time to go
up to the mountain to be alone with his
father the only way he could continue to
fulfill his mission on earth was to make
sure he continued to spend quiet lengthy
times with abba in order to be filled
with the fresh anointing and anna where
to best go from that point a number of
months ago I was intending to drive
across town to run an errand but yah had
me go via a completely different route
that taught me better how to listen to
his voice and to walk by the spirit the
following is the testimony that i wrote
had an awesome series of events that
occur today which i must share for
freely I've received so freely I must
now give I had intended to reach a
destination on the opposite side of town
from where I live the best most logical
way to get there is to take the major
freeways that ring Portland Oregon but
yah had me trace a very unusual route
using google maps one which was winding
and sneaking and confusing at best one
which would more than double my time to
get to my destination obedient I allowed
you ought to guide me on this route that
I had managed to map out on Google at
one point I made a wrong turn missing
one of the streets I was shown on the
route as I was going to turn around a
huge sign on the right hand of the road
said christmann picture frames I had
never seen this place before and I
certainly had no need to buy a picture
frame I went inside and a lady maybe in
her mid-20s stood at the desk asking how
she could help me well I said this is
going to sound strange but I was told to
give you this I would drew from my
pocket a track and pressed it into her
hand she took it immediately and as if
nothing had happened said oh great as if
it were the most normal thing in the
world I said Shalom door and hurried
back to my car when I was trying to get
back to the original route a log
cabin-style barber shop caught my eye
but I drove past anyway then I got back
on the route yaad shown me and I saw one
of the biggest most men
churches I had ever seen it was called
tabernacle something or other and I only
saw it out of the corner of my eye the
church was huge I drove past it but knew
something was important about the
structure I got lost a few more times
winding to the rugged hills of Portland
and passed a massive multimillion-dollar
country club again it caught my eye but
I drove past I finally reached my
destination and as I completed my
business I gave the head woman who ran
the facility a track she studied
intently and thanked me I knew y'all
wanted me to trace the same winding
route even though I could cut my time in
half by again just taking the logical
course of action using the freeways to
get back home this time I made sure to
stop at the multi-million country club
elegant chandeliers rich red carpet a
glassed wall looking out onto a sweeping
green golf course all caught my eye I
was entranced by the sheer wealth yah
said to me this will all fall Daniel all
of it as I was stepping out to leave I
turned to the woman a lady maybe in her
30s at the lobby intake area and again
said I know this sounds strange but I
was told to give this to you to me she
said excitedly as she took the track
Shalom I said as I left I went back to
that wrong turn and parked my car in the
log cabin-style barber shops parking lot
I stepped inside and the friendliest
bald-headed Barbara greeted me I gave
him a track and he thanked me I finally
retraced my journey and found the
immense Tabernacle looking church it was
a Tuesday and I knew it would be locked
I went to the front of the church and
sure enough all the glass doors were
locked I was about to turn away when an
elderly woman appeared and asked me if I
needed anything she had opened a side
door I had initially not seen yes I was
told to give this to your pastor in the
church elders here she took the track
with my website and her face glowed oh
okay great in wonder I breathe shallow
she got the biggest smile on her face
and said Shalom to you too it was only
after I was leaving but I realized I
just stopped at one of the biggest
seventh-day Adventist churches in
portland oregon i returned home stunned
amazed and Laura
Fang Yong this is the step by step
moment by moment leading his people must
learn in these coming days absolute
precision in the tour of Mo che an
absolute clarity from his voice will be
the two guardrails that will give that
will give to those who wish the promise
of Philadelphia in the coming years to
find out the promise given to the
assembly of Philadelphia read the first
part of the book of Revelation that day
still burns fresh my memory this was not
something I had planned out I simply had
to make myself available to yah and walk
in his leading even if that leading
didn't make complete sense at the time
imagine avraham over seven years of age
comfortable in the desert town in which
he had lived for most of his life his
father brothers sisters aunts and uncles
had all lived there for decades his
whole life was in her on then the voice
softened still but unmistakable
commanded get out of your country and
Frederick injured and from your father's
house and go to a land that I will show
you in a moment Avraham had to leave
everything he had known all his life
uproot his wife and nephew and head west
into Kanaan a land he had only known
from rumours powerful warlike people
dwelt in the lush hills flowing with
milk and honey the thoughts racing
through Abraham's mind as he began to
head west word must have filled him with
doubt and concern yet he obeyed he
followed ya's voice he learned to walk
in the spirit spending time with abba
learning to listen to his voice than
doing what he says often strips us from
our comfort zones yah doesn't bothered
to explain everything to us beforehand
he gives up step by step instructions
and only by obedience does he then
reveal where you would have us go next
this case is totally dependent upon him
enlarging our faith the chaos in trouble
that will soon unleash across this earth
will be beyond imagination this is why
the scripture declares that men's hearts
will fail them there is no way to quote
plan for this time period one must
simply learn to rely on the creator of
all things waiting on him listening to
him following his guidance this is
absolutely essential the alternative is
fear panic and placing yourself in
danger by going somewhere yah has not
told you
go we must learn to hear and follow his
voice because in the tribulation this
will make the difference between life
and death no matter how chaotic events
begin churning across this planet the
very knowledge that we are exactly where
yah wants us to be doing exactly what he
is telling us to do will keep us in his
abiding Shalom we must in the worms of
words of the psalmist learn to be still
and know that I am yah
you
